casebody.data:
Blackwell et al., Appellees, v. Cubby Drilling, Inc., Appellant.

[Cite as Blackwell v. Cubby Drilling, Inc. (1988), 37 Ohio St. 3d 245.]

No. 87-1583 Submitted June 2, 1988 Decided June 29, 1988. John M. Skakun and Patricia L. Byard, for appellees. Kincaid, Cultice & Geyer and Peter N. Cultice, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on authority of Van Fossen v. Babcock & Wilcox Co. (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 100, 522 N.E. 2d 489.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
